TextBlock.Text: life located sixth planet from sun<Color=lightblue> | \\\~ o . | | |||~ | o o O --> O <-- | | ///~ o . | </Color>communication detected - translation begun
[retrieving relevant log entry... ] [ -search query: "eclipse" ] [ -time recorded: t-minus 125,268 G-hr ] [ -log author: explorer ] [error: translation incomplete ]

"Alright. Log time. Nothing much to record, just more empty space. Scientist says we'll arrive at a new cluster next cycle. Maybe we'll finally encounter another civilization. It's been what? Seventy-two cycles since that last happened? The Codex is getting a little dusty with so little of note to record."

"Note: I hope the next body we dock at has a flammable atmosphere. It's been so long since our last campfire. Do you think the there will still be campfires After? I'm sure there will. So many bodies have had them, they must be some constant of the universe."

"Archivist was talking again this cycle about needing to test the recipients' technology. It's the most he's talked in a long time, kept going on about "spheres" and "a total eclipse". It's weird how much he insists on this additional security measure when he's usually so worried about, how does he put it - "the breaking of the Chain"?"
